data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Button,
        Transition,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let variation = "exit";
</script>

<Button
    on:click={() =>
        (variation =
            variation === "exit" ? "enter" : "exit")}
>
    Toggle Variation
</Button>

<Transition
    animation="clip"
    behavior="explicit"
    {variation}
>
    <Box palette="inverse" padding="medium">
        hello world!
    </Box>
</Transition>
data.title: Transition Explicit
